name: investment-projects-dom
title: Dominican Republic Investment Projects
description: This data set provides a detailed overview of investment projects in the Dominican Republic. Includes relevant information about each project, such as its value, current status, regional classifications, among others. These data have been compiled with the purpose of offering a comprehensive vision of the development of investment in the country and facilitating analysis and decision-making in public and private policies.

contributors.title:
SNIP - National Public Investment System, Ministry of Economy, Planning
and Development (MEPyD)

sources.title:
SNIP - National Public Investment System, Ministry of Economy, Planning
and Development (MEPyD)

resources.title: Dominican Republic Investment Projects
resources.description: This data set provides a detailed overview of investment projects in the Dominican Republic. Includes relevant information about each project, such as its value, current status, regional classifications, among others. These data have been compiled with the purpose of offering a comprehensive vision of the development of investment in the country and facilitating analysis and decision-making in public and private policies.
resources.name: proyectos

fields.name: IdProyecto
fields.description: Project identification code within MapaInversiones

fields.name: codigosnip
fields.description: Project identifier code in the government institution

fields.name: AnioInicioProyecto
fields.description: Project start year

fields.name: AnioFinProyecto
fields.description: Final year of the project

fields.name: NombreProyecto
fields.description: Project name

fields.name: DuracionEstimadaProyecto
fields.description: Project duration in years

fields.name: EtapaActual
fields.description: Current stage of the project

fields.name: CostoEstimadoProyecto
fields.description: Estimated cost of the project in RD$

fields.name: tipoproyecto
fields.description: Type of project scope. For example, National or Departmental

fields.name: Sector
fields.description: Name of the sector to which the investment project belongs. Ex. Education, Health, Transportation

fields.name: avancefinanciero
fields.description: Percentage of financial progress of the project

fields.name: nombreproducto
fields.description: Name of the product associated with the project

fields.name: meta
fields.description: Product goal associated with the project

fields.name: ejecutado
fields.description: Executed value of the product associated with the project

fields.name: UnidaddelProducto
fields.description: Unit of measurement of the product associated with the project

fields.name: nombrefase
fields.description: Name of the phase in which the project is located (Ex: Pre-investment, Investment)

fields.name: entidadejecutora
fields.description: Primary project executor

fields.name: fuentefinanciacion
fields.description: Name of the project financing source

fields.name: organismofinanciador
fields.description: Name of the project financing organization

fields.name: valorprogramado
fields.description: Current value of the financing source associated with the project

fields.name: valorejecutado
fields.description: Executed value of the financing source associated with the project

fields.name: AnioEjecucionPptal
fields.description: Budget execution year

fields.name: nombreregion
fields.description: Name of the region where the project is located

fields.name: nombreprovincia
fields.description: Name of the province where the project is located

fields.name: nombremunicipio
fields.description: Name of the municipality where the project is located

fields.name: fechacarguearchivo
fields.description: Date of last upload of project information in MapaInversiones

fields.name: fuentedatos
fields.description: Project data source
